forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Potential for flooding rains. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Potential for flooding rains. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
